overview.title: Kakaretso
overview.subtitle: Tshekatsheko ya marketing le dikgopolo ka bonako
overview.description: Fumana ponelopele e e feletseng ya maiteko a gago a marketing mo metseng yotlhe le dikampanye.

email.title: Tshekatsheko ya Email
email.subtitle: Tlhola, roma, mme o latele dikampanye tsa email
email.description: Rala di-email tse dintle, busa dipalo tsa ba ba ikwaditseng, mme o sekaseke tshekatsheko ya kampanye.

ads.title: Tsamaiso ya Ditshwantsho
ads.subtitle: Busetsa dikampanye tsa gago tsa ditshwantsho
ads.description: Tlhola mme o tokafatse dikampanye tsa ditshwantsho mo maphatleng a le mantsi mme o latele ROI.

events.title: Ditiragalo
events.subtitle: Rulaganya mme o buse ditiragalo tsa marketing
events.description: Rulaganya di-webinar, mekete ya kgwebo, le ditiragalo tse dingwe tsa marketing go kgomaretsa baetsedi ba gago.

buyer_intent.title: Maikemisetso a Mmoreki
buyer_intent.subtitle: Tlhoma ba ba nang le maikemisetso a a kwa godimo
buyer_intent.description: Latele disegwana tsa theko mme o tlhoma ba ba ikemiseditseng go reka.

lead_scoring.title: Go Bala ga Ditsenekelelo
lead_scoring.subtitle: Bala mme o tseye ditsenekelelo tse di botlhokwa ka tshiamiso
lead_scoring.description: Dirisa data ya boitshwaro le ya batho go bala mme o beke ditsenekelelo tsa gago ka tshiamiso.

journeys.title: Maeto
journeys.subtitle: Rala mekgwa ya tshekatsheko ya mokgweetsi
journeys.description: Tlhola mekgwa ya marketing e e tshiamisitsweng go ntshetsa ditsenekelelo ka funnel ya thekiso.

forecasting.title: Go Bolela Pele
forecasting.subtitle: Bolela pele tshekatsheko ya marketing
forecasting.description: Dirisa go bolela pele ga AI go bolela pele dipoelo tsa kampanye mme o tokafatse dipeelo.

meetings.title: Moedi wa Dipitso
meetings.subtitle: Rulaganya dipitso le ba ba ikemiseditseng
meetings.description: Letlelela ba ba ikemiseditseng go beka dipitso ka tshiamiso mme o tshwantshetse le kalantare ya gago.

analytics.title: Dipalopalo
analytics.subtitle: Dipalopalo tsa marketing le go bega
analytics.description: Latele dipalo tsa tshekatsheko, tlhola diporofense, mme o fumanne dikgopolo ka ga ROI ya gago ya marketing.

empty_state.title: O ikemiseditse go simolola?
empty_state.description: Kopanya mefuta ya gago ya data mme o simolole go aga dikampanye tsa marketing tse di maatla.
empty_state.no_data: Ga go na data e e fitlhelwang go fitlha ga jaanong
